## Replication Code

### R Scripts

All analyses were conducted in R (version X.X.X). The following scripts replicate our main results:

1. **[01_data_preparation.R](scripts/01_data_preparation.R)** - Data cleaning and preparation
2. **[02_main_analysis.R](scripts/02_main_analysis.R)** - Main regression analyses
3. **[03_robustness.R](scripts/03_robustness.R)** - Robustness checks
4. **[04_figures.R](scripts/04_figures.R)** - Creates all figures in the paper

### Required Packages
```r
# Install required packages
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "fixest", "modelsummary", 
                   "DT", "plotly", "stargazer"))
```

### Reproducibility

To fully replicate our results:

1. Download all data files to a `/data` subdirectory
2. Download all R scripts to a `/scripts` subdirectory  
3. Update file paths in the scripts to match your directory structure
4. Run scripts in numerical order

### System Requirements

- R version 4.0 or higher
- At least 8GB RAM recommended for processing large datasets
